SA01n757:1123: tasya yadi jarasā śaktirna vihanyeta sa dvitīyamapi phalamākṣipeta |
SA01n757:1125: tasmādgamyate kaścijjarākhyaḥ śatruastaṃ jarjarīkṛtyopahṛtasāmarthyamanityatāpiśācyāḥ samarpayatīti yuktamuktam ‘śaktihānerjarāsiddhiḥ’ iti |
SA01n757:1127: evaṃ laghvācakṣāṇena bhavatā sāṃkhyīyaḥ pariṇāmo'bhyupagato bhavati |
SA01n757:1130: anya eva hi no jarākhyo dharmo,
SA01n757:1132: sāṃkhyasya tvavasthitasya dharmiṇaḥ svātmabhūtasya dharmāntarasyotsargaḥ svātmabhūtasya cotpādaḥ pariṇāma iti |
SA01n757:1149: kiñca, ye cārthātmānaḥ paścādbhavanti teṣāṃ pūrvaheturasti tadyathā bhasmano bījādisaṃyogaḥ |
SA01n757:1152: tatra yaduktaṃ jātasya sthityanyathātvamapekṣya vināśo bhavatīti tadayuktam |
SA01n757:1162: yasya punarahetukastasya prāgapi janmanaḥ so'stīti janmaiva na syāt,
SA01n757:1175: kā caiṣā vāco yuktiḥ sati ca bhavati tadviśeṣyaścātadvirodhī ca |
SA01n757:1186: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā-“utpannānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhāya” iti |
SA01n757:1188: tathā-“tisraḥ saṃvartanyo'nalajalānilākhyā yābhiḥ krameṇa yāvacchubhakṛtsnā vinaśyante” iti |
SA01n757:1209: te ca tadadhīnotpattayo niruktyadhīnārthapravṛttayaśca jñānavadarthasya pratinidhisthānīyāḥ |
SA01n757:1218: vācā saha kacaṭatapādayo jāyante tayā nidhīyanta iti |
SA01n757:1219: prativarṇānuvartinīnāṃ vācāṃ sāvayavatve'pi sati tadabhidhānānupapattiriti cet | na |
SA01n757:1227: tatra nāmaparyāyaḥ saṃjñākaraṇaṃ yathā ghaṭa iti |
SA01n757:1232: vyañjanaparyāyo'kṣaraṃ yathā ka ityetadakṣaraṃ niravayavamamūrtamapratighaṃ rūpalakṣaṇavimuktaṃ traikālikārthapratyāyanasamarthaṃ manovada pratihatagamanamiti |
SA01n757:1235: vākchabda evārtheṣu saṃjñākartṛkṛtāvadhiḥ smṛtyā gṛhītāvayavasamudāyaḥ śroturarthaṃ pratyāya[ya]tīti kimanyairnāmādibhiḥ parikalpitaiḥ ?
SA01n757:1250: na caivaṃ vākyātmānaḥ śabdāḥ buddhyupagṛhotāvayavasamudāyasaṃkṣepāḥ kramalabdhajanmānaḥ pratyekamarthaṃ(rtha)
SA01n757:1258: rthibhirupādīyate na ca kaścicchabdaḥ kasmiṃścidarthe kenacitsaṃbandhiviśeṣeṇa niyatavṛttiḥ,
SA01n757:1279: kiṃ punarete nāmakāyādayo nityā āhosvidanityā iti ?
SA01n757:1287: tadyathā jñānaṃ cakṣurādīn hetūnapekṣyārthaṃ vibhāvayati tadvannāmādayo'pi ghoṣādīn hetūnapekṣyārthaṃ pratyāyayanti |
SA01n757:1294: āñjasā hi vāṅ nāmni pravartate nāmābhilapatotyarthaḥ |
SA01n757:1295: nāma tvarthaṃ dyotayatīti prativarṇānuvartino vāk khalu nāmābhilapanto svañca rūpamudbhāvayantī santānena pravartamānā guṇakalpanayā'rthaṃ pratyāyayatītyapadiśyate |
SA01n757:1310: atītavarṇasamudāyastvantyavarṇāpekṣo manobuddhyopagṛhītasvarūpaḥ saṃbandhinyarthe buddhimutpādayan pratyāyayatīti yuktarūpo vyapadeśaḥ |
SA01n757:1319: pratihanyate khalu śabdaḥ prākārabhittyādiṣu tasmātpratighātī śabda iti | na |
SA01n757:1327: ālāṅgalagrāhebhyaḥ siddhametadgarbhagṛhāntargatena pihite kavāṭe'bhihanyamānāḥ paṭahāḥ dhmāpyamānāśca śaṃkhā na śrūyante |
SA01n757:1331: yadapyucyate sphoṭaḥ śabdo dhvaniḥ śabdaguṇa iti tatrāpadiśyate-
SA01n757:1334: yathā hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇiriti lokaprasiddhametat | tasmāt-
SA01n757:1339: yadapyucyate vaiyākaraṇaiḥ śabdo buddhinirgrāhya eṣa vaiśeṣikairapi śrotragrāhyaḥ,
SA01n757:1341: nyatve'pi ca śabdatvādayaḥ śrotreṇa gṛhyanta iti |
SA01n757:1343: [147] na śrutyā śrūyate śabdastadanyā ca gatiḥ śruteḥ |
SA01n757:1348: tatra ya āryayā niruktyā nirucyante dvādaśāyatanaviṣayāste niyatābhidheyaṃ(yasaṃ)
SA01n757:1351: ye tu yathecchaṃ pitrādibhiḥ kriyante nāmakāyādibhiste hyaniyatā yadṛcchikā ityucyante |
SA01n757:1356: ye hyapaurūṣeyā dhātvāyatanaskandhādyavadyotakāste prathamaṃ buddhaviṣayā eva |
